title: Top Radio Calls of 2017
itunes:title: Top Radio Calls of 2017
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling & Marc Sessler- are in on a company holiday to give the listeners what they want! The heroes discuss the latest news from around the league, including Bengals’ QB AJ McCarron becoming a free agent (5:00), Larry Fitzgerald’s plans for 2018 (9:00) and Gruden’s vision for Michael Crabtree (28:00); They review the top radio calls of 2017, which include an appearance from The Zola (33:00), a sonnet by Ron Wolfley and THE No. 1 call of 2017 (41:00);. Plus, NFL.com’s Gregg Rosenthal gives a glimpse into his franchise tag predictions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
